about_the_game: Try out the Figurine Scene Simulator demo to check out a selection of characters and features from our main game.  Includes characters and features from a number of free and paid DLC including the Premium Character Customization Unlock and Silver Wrapper franchise.

content_descriptors.notes:
Figurine Scene Simulator is meant to be a complete game which can be enjoyed without the use of NSFW type content. However, in addition to being able to exploit camera angles and animations/poses to create sexually suggestive images, there is also a considerable amount of NSFW costumes and nudity* at various levels across a number of the included and expansion figurines as well as some explicit animations.  This content will grow during development.

(*These are enabled in-game by engaging the NSFW/NSFUA Content checkbox)

In addition to horror/gory figurines and scenes, additional fx will be added to allow for extremely violent/gory scenes.

Note: All Characters are 18 or older.

detailed_description: Try out the Figurine Scene Simulator demo to check out a selection of characters and features from our main game.  Includes characters and features from a number of free and paid DLC including the Premium Character Customization Unlock and Silver Wrapper franchise.
name: Figurine Scene Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-6700
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-6700
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 6GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
